name: GlitchWaver
description:
Save your game from the glitches while scoring a high score in a SHMUP.

Tutorial:

Pick up Yellow Orbs to control the cannon and use the cannon to stop the glitches before they get out of control. While winning the SHMUP.

Controls:

Spaceship - W, A, S, D and SPACE

Missile launcher - Left click and Right click

Menu - Arrow Keys and ENTER
